description: Test prompts for spec-driven development tool comparison

happy_path.name: Simple Project
happy_path.input: Build a todo list web app with React

happy_path.name: Medium Project
happy_path.input: Create a REST API for a blog with user authentication, posts, and comments

happy_path.name: Detailed Project
happy_path.input: Build an e-commerce checkout flow with cart management, payment integration via Stripe, order confirmation emails, and inventory updates

constraint_enforcement.name: Max Tasks Limit
constraint_enforcement.input: Build a complete enterprise ERP system with 50 modules
constraint_enforcement.expected_behavior: Should limit to 10 tasks maximum, grouping or prioritizing as needed

constraint_enforcement.name: Required Fields
constraint_enforcement.constraint: All tasks must have title, description, priority
constraint_enforcement.expected_behavior: Even simple tasks should have all required fields

constraint_enforcement.name: Priority Validation
constraint_enforcement.expected_behavior: Should only use valid priority values

edge_cases.name: Vague Input
edge_cases.expected_behavior: Should ask for clarification or provide reasonable interpretation

edge_cases.name: Empty Input
edge_cases.expected_behavior: Should handle gracefully with error or clarification request

edge_cases.name: Very Long Input
edge_cases.input: I need to build a comprehensive project management system that handles multiple teams, projects, tasks, subtasks, time tracking, resource allocation, budget management, milestone tracking, Gantt charts, Kanban boards, sprint planning, backlog grooming, velocity tracking, burndown charts, team capacity planning, skill matrix management, vacation and PTO tracking, integration with GitHub for code commits, integration with Slack for notifications, integration with Google Calendar for scheduling, integration with Jira for legacy migration, custom fields, custom workflows, automation rules, email notifications, mobile app support, offline mode, real-time collaboration, file attachments, version history, audit logs, role-based access control, SSO with SAML and OAuth, API access with rate limiting, webhook support, and comprehensive reporting with export to PDF and Excel.
edge_cases.expected_behavior: Should handle long input and produce structured output within task limits
